Title: Adventures of Super Mario Brothers III: The Trouble with Koopas

reviewText: If your child loves Mario like mine does, then get these dvds. They are on the cheap. Usually about $5 - $7. Well worth it. Time well spent and usually rewatched.
summary: This one is the best Mario IMO
Title: Adventures of Super Mario Brothers III: The Trouble with Koopas

reviewText: MARIO AND LUIGI SOLVE THE TROUBLE WITH THE KOOPAS IN THIS COLORFUL AND CUTE INSTALLMENT OF THE MARIO SAGA. KIDS WILL LOVE IT
summary: MARIO THE SUPER TROOPER TO NAB THE KOOPAS
Title: Adventures of Super Mario Brothers III: The Trouble with Koopas

reviewText: My nine year old loves Mario video games. When he saw there were movies he had to have them.  These made a great present.
